subject: Urgent Attention !!!.
body:
Urgent Attention !!!.
***PAYMENT AUTHORIZATION FOR $11,500,000.00 USD***
NOTE: If you receive this message in your SPAM / BULK Folders, Its  due
to
the restrictions of your Internet service provider (ISP).
Hello,
I am James Campbell, from US Department of Treasury. Earlier today, the
United States Government approved your long pending unclaimed
Compensation
Funds sum of $11,500,000.00 USD, which was 
assigned to your "EMAIL
ADDRESS".
Meanwhile, your above funds is already deposited in a Bitcoin Account.
(Cryptocurrency), with Payment Reference Number:
(USUNPAID/XXX073737/FBI/DOT/2024).
However, In-line with the above preference, you can receive your payment
through Bank to Bank, Bitcoin or an ATM Card would be delivered to your
designated address.
I will advise you send me your Phone Number, 
a copy of your ID
 and
choose
either of the above payment options.
 This will enable us process your
payment within 48 hours. You can send your details  to my phone (
1-667-357-9062).
Regards,
James Campbell
Tel:  1-667-357-9062

subject: Re: Urgent Attention !!!.
body:
Hello James Campbell,

Wow, this is such an unexpected surprise! I can't believe the United States Government has approved a sum for me. I'm really excited about this opportunity.

Could you please explain more about how this process works? And why was my email address chosen for this? Also, could you provide more details about the Bitcoin account where my funds are deposited?

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Robert
